Reviews.Title: Worlds fastest and easy to setup Wireless IP Cam. Only took 5 minutes from start to finish!
Reviews.Author: Brian Smith

} } } Length:: 7:22 MinsThis is an unboxing of the Cavalry wireless IP Cam. This camera was so easy to setup that it only took me 5 minutes. I have the Foscam and that took me at least an hour with all the extra configuration I had to do. Simply amazing quick setup wireless IP camera that works. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Quick and easy setup for a security camera
Reviews.Author: Awkward Hamster
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_moSS9QDL7F1Q4A', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_moSS9QDL7F1Q4AloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_moSS9QDL7F1Q4AcurrentClick) { return cv_moSS9QDL7F1Q4AcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 6:11 MinsThanks to the WPS and QR Code at the bottom of this unit, you can set this up to be viewed on your smartphone or tablet in under 2 minutes. The View Anytime app is really geared towards security and administration. You can easily record all events to the microSD card or just record motion alerts. The records capture the video and audio. You can remotely access the recorded events from the View Anytime app.Another neat feature this app offers that many others do not is the ability to tell you how many people are viewing the camera.If your internet can not handle the 720 HD video, you can lower the resolution all the way down to QVGA.What I couldn't figure out was how to view the camera from my computer. And since View Anytime app doesn't have a VOX feature, this isn't going to replace my baby monitor.**UPDATE 2/1/2014**Cavalry sent me the viewing app for Windows and said they're currently working on a Mac version.

Reviews.Title: ALMOST PERFECT!  however excellent. much better than foscam
Reviews.Author: Christopher Jackson
Reviews.Content: Your wife will thank you for purchasing this since its so easy to use and offers a nice security for your home. Im very happy with my purchase and plan on getting another unit for my front door.I have a Foscam and its so clunky to setup and its gets setup issues every once in while that i have to reconfigure. I only had the Cavalry IP cam for a few days but already I feel relieved at how easy it is to us. Im gonna ditch my Foscam. Once you try this IP cam you will not go back. 720P HD quality is excellent also.THE GOOD1. Excellent Video quality. The h264 works very nicely in wifi mode as well. 720P is nice and sharp.2. Ease of setup. The setup is by far the easiest I have ever encountered. It as simple as this:A: Plug in IP Cam into AC wall plug and use Ethernet cable to plug IP Cam in to router with Ethernet cable.B: Download the ViewAnytime App on iphone or android phoneC: Open App and select Add Camera Button. Make sure phone is on same Wifi Network as router and choose the Ip Cam that is available. Enter password: 000000. And click save.D: Still using the App click on the newly configured Ip Cam on App. Make sure it works by swiping left and right to move camera. Once satisfied, click the back button and click Blue Arrow button to configure Wifi. Click Advanced and then scroll to Wifi Section and Click. Choose the Wifi that the IP Cam is connected to and enter Password. Once complete touch the Join button and remove IP Cam Ethernet Cable cable from router and remove power plug and replug. Once IP Cam restarts it will be wireless connected.E: Place IP Cam anywhere in house and connect to wall plug. Voila! Your IP Cam is set. Super easy to connect.3. Infra-Red work very well. Images show up in sharp in black and white.4. Wifi works very well. I had the Cavalry IP Cam setup in the farthest away spot in my house and works well.5. Very easy to Listen and Speak on App. Sound quality of speaker is very good.6. The camera rotate very nice with app I can rotate almost all the way around and tilts amost vertically.7. The wide angle view doesn’t distort the image8. You don’t have to worry about complicated setup with dealing with setting up a DynDNS or Port Forwarding like Foscam. This is very straightforward and easy to useCons:1.  No Web User Interface. Can only use on smartphone or tablet.2.  Does not work with IP Cam Viewer App. Manufacturer app work great but it would be nice to see it integrated with IP Cam Viewer.

Reviews.Title: Literally took me 2 mins to download and connect.  Foscam took all night to set up.
Reviews.Author: Action Jackson
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 Foscam FI8910W when my 2nd child was born last March.  2 was installed in my house and 1 in my MIL's place (Mother-in-law).  Getting it configured with port forwarding was truly a pain in the bxtt.  Although I am not a network engineer, I have certain background of computer experience.  Having said that, getting the ports to open correctly did take some study time and trail and error to get it to work.  For a regular person without any computer knowledge, it would be nearly impossible.  My MIL's house has Verizon FIOS all in one modem and wireless router.  Getting that set up was even more difficult.Then it's choosing the best app for my iphone connection.  Went through at least 10 app and concluded Baby Monitor by Tiny Solutions to work the best.The downside of FI8910W was image resolution wasn't HD.I came across this Cavalry unit while browsing for my 4th camera on 720HD. Foscam FI9821W was the logical choice, but after reading all the positive review on IPC10010, I gave it a try.Literally, it only took me 2 minutes to get it hooked up and download the app for iphone.  I can't believe this.  How can they do this without messing with router port forwarding setting is fascinating.  Even my wife, who has no computer knowledge, can do this.  Plug in Internet RJ45 plug, plug in power, download the app from the app store, open the app and the app already detected the IP Cam.  It was done!Getting it connected was the most impressive part.However, this IP cam still has room to improve and truly compete with Foscam's full line of settings and functions.1)  The Green light under the lens was a bit annoying.  I wish there's option to turn it off.2)  iPhone screen couldn't be turned off while the app is running on the background.  (important feature for a baby monitor)3)  No email notification.4)  More expensive than Foscam FI9821W.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to setup
Reviews.Author: JC E
Reviews.Content: I got it working very quickly. Remember after you input the wifi setting, the manual says disconnect the RJ45 cable and "restart" the camera - it means physically unplug the power and plug it back in. If you just hit "reconnect" in View Anything it won't work.It is more expensive than the Foscam. I don't have a Foscam but many reviews mention how hard to set one up. The Cavalry is super easy and worth the extra cost.I am planning on getting two more.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT, YOU WON'T REGRET!
Reviews.Author: daniel white
Reviews.Content: Used for my home office and so far so good. Videos records on micro SD cards and it does not take much space. A 32 gb can record about a week or so of footage. View Anytime app runs very smoothly on my Android Galaxy Note 2. I'm considering buying another one to expand my house security.

Reviews.Title: It's Amazing Product
Reviews.Author: 47-zone
Reviews.Content: This Camera is very easy to use. High quality video and clear audio. It Also support Intercom and mobile use. Wow.. I really love this product.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup and very good quality Video
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: It is so easy to setup, even my 14 yrs old son could do it.  The only problem I got during the installation was I forgot my Apple Store password which is nothing to do with this product at all.  I am very impressed by its video quality.  My pets look very cute on the screen.  Gee, I really love this toy !!

Reviews.Title: Good and Easy to Set Up
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: The Calvary IPC is everything that it says it is.  It's super easy to set up on your phone or tablet so that you can see what is happening when you're not at home.  It can double as a baby monitor when at home as well.  The image is crisp in both color and black/white.  The lag is relatively low compared to its other cameras.  It can also store a lot of video with its cap of 64GB MicroSD.  The only downside is that it can't connect via computer.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up and work perfect in my daughter's room
Reviews.Author: EC
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It's so easy to set up and little work to do. And it works on my iphone perfectly. 5 stars product.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: The Calvary PC 10010, is a very nice camera it"s true to set it up is a breeze no problem at all, I only set it up on my iPhone and iPad. The small SD card is Not included, but the camera works just as described I'm still playing with the motion sensor to get it too work in the best way; i'm still learning how not to erase footage from the camera SD card. When motion is detected it does not send you a notice you have to voluntarily look at your app to find out of something triggered the motion sensor. At this point I do believe that I might be purchasing two more for my home thanks!

Reviews.Title: does what it's supposed to
Reviews.Author: denon
Reviews.Content: nice, compact camera. works well with my iphone. you might think it's geeky, but i enjoy watching my fish tanks while i'm out, haha!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what I needed.  Extremely easy to setup.  Outstanding picture and
Reviews.Author: B.Rowe
Reviews.Content: Outstanding picture and App.  Asked for the App for a PC on Saturday and Calvary responded on Sunday that it would be sent on Monday.  Received on Monday and App for PC is as easy to setup as the one for my Android.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT QUALITY! EASY TO SETUP AND HD VIDEO
Reviews.Author: Hung Kai Tai
Reviews.Content: I bought this and it is such a perfect product, HD, night vision, the most important part is it's user-friendlyGosh i hate the complication of setting up wires and other craps.

Reviews.Title: EXTREMELY EASY SET UP
Reviews.Author: lewis h hudson
Reviews.Content: I will be purchasing another one of these little beauties.  When I first started shopping for a wireless video camera, Foscams seem to dominate the market, but EVERY SINGLE review I read complained of how hard the cameras were to set up.  Then I came across this Cavalry camera and someone had posted a video of the ease of setup and I was sold.  I still had SOME skepticism until I actually got my hands on the unit and it was EXACTLY as the video had described.  I had the camera up and running in under 5 minutes from the time I opened the box.

Reviews.Title: Defective - Dark Shadow, including replacement.
Reviews.Author: Moosetrax
Reviews.Content: Bought one for overnight delivery, needed to monitor new dog.Pros:Easy quick setupFeatures (the only reason why I gave 2 stars after debating to give 1)Amazon's customer service and quick return/refund.Cons:Had black shadow that covered 20% of image.Figured it was just my luck, so immediately contacted Amazon and received instant refund, and ordered another for overnight shipment.The replacement had the same dark shadow in image. I tried using two different smartphones and one tablet to view the camera. ALL had the same dark shadow.Contacted Amazon again and they provided shipping label and full refund again.

Reviews.Title: Most useful thing I have bought.
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to remotely monitor a piece of machinery at work, it will also be handy when I need home maintenance done and can't be there to watch the work being performed. I have a friend interested in getting one so she can check in on her pets while she is at work. Love this camera !

Reviews.Title: I love it, Great Product.
Reviews.Author: Brett A Garner "Brett"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. It does everything that is promised and the product quality really seems to be great. I thought it was very smart the way QR codes are used to speed up installation. You can scan a QR code to download the app onto your phone and then you can scan the QR code on the bottom of the camera to connect to the camera, its pretty slick.I've been using my camera to kinda keep an eye on my dog while Im at the office and when he isn't sleeping its kinda of comical to watch what he does during the day. I have also used it outside on the back porch to see what he does outside. Its pretty nice once you are connected to your wifi network then you can just move it around your house and put it where ever you want just as long as you are within the wifi range and an outlet. Nice!!!

Reviews.Title: Not ready for prime time
Reviews.Author: Windmill326 "lb"
Reviews.Content: This camera has serious firmware problems. All of you (phone folk) that think it's great, don't realize it's limitations. I tried it on a lap top, and 8" tablet. the fps range from 4 -10 depending on the quality of the video you want. Even a "grocery store" camera normally give 30 fps. I contacted the mfg with my findings prior to retuning the unit. Their engineers agreed that they had throttled back the camera  capabilities as it was designed for 3G-4G connection to the internet, not Wi-Fi.They promised a firmware upgrade would be developed. Also camera is "overpriced". Good luck.

Reviews.Title: Bad spelled with ten bads
Reviews.Author: RosieAndMe
Reviews.Content: Very limited viewing angle, manual focus if you are looking for a good security camera get a Dropcam.  Dropcam does not rotate but you can get a rotating platform.  I use the "First Alert 599 Pan/Scan 360-Degree Rotating Platform Accessory with Wireless Remote".  Dropcam is used by many commercial establishments for security but never do they use the Cavalry.  Dropcam uses cloud video storage (expensive) but if the bad guy steals the camera the video is still available in the cloud.

Reviews.Title: ONLY works with iOS and Android
Reviews.Author: Jamie Mathy "Jamie Mathy"
Reviews.Content: Probably my naivete, but when I see something says it is compatible with Android and iOS, I naturally assume it works like normal PLUS mobile compatibility.  Not so on this camera.  It only works with their app and that's it.Also, this camera is only black and white - no where is the description does it say black & white only.If you wanted to use this as a baby monitor, I can see it's usefulness.  But outside of that, I don't understand why you would want to pay this much for a camera that doesn't do any of the stuff the $89 Foscam cameras do.  Normally if I pay more I expect better features ON TOP of competitor features.  I'm sending this back.That being said, it was easy to set it up.  5 minutes on an iPhone.  Took longer to get it out the box than anything else.
